name: Blunt Sword
description: A dull sword made by a novice. It smashes rather than cuts.

name: Starling Sword
description: This is used for slashing and stabbing. A useful short sword for beginners.

name: Apprentice Sword
description: For those not used to handling a sword. It's much lighter than it looks.

name: Nightingale Sword
description: A sword with an eye-catching blade. It's very light in your hands.

name: Star Pupil's Sword
description: A Japanese sword with a brilliant shine. It can mow down even large enemies.

skill: Higher chance to cause criticals to Rubeus J.
name: Red Cat Blade
description: A sword tempered to defeat Rubeus J. It easily slices his tough red body.

skill: Criticals deal 75% more damage.
name: Kitchen Knife
description: An ordinary knife for food preparation. Not recommended for use in battle.

name: Oni Smasher
description: A huge club that can probably smash anything with its tremendous weight.

name: Mouse Mallet
description: A small mallet made for a mouse. Small, but can pack a mean pounding.

name: Lethal Hammer
description: It's too heavy to defend with, but the hammer's power makes up for it.

name: Raven's Blade
description: A sword as black as a raven. It's favored by ninjas for its stealth.

name: Master's Sword
description: A sharp sword used by a swordsman who's lived through many battles.

name: Bunny Blaster
description: It was developed to fight even in space. A powerful beam gun for Usapyon only.

skill: Higher chance to cause criticals to Rubeus J.
name: Red Cat Blade EX
description: An evolved sword to defeat Rubeus J. Only thing the red fiend is afraid of.

skill: Criticals deal 75% more damage.
name: Chef's Knife
description: A kitchen knife favored by pro chefs. Works as a weapon in an emergency.

name: Oni Smasher (Red)
description: A red club made to look like Gargaros. You get the power of an Oni with this!?

name: Mahogany Mallet
description: A strong mallet made from mahogany. Its sturdy presence soothes the soul.

name: Oni Smasher (Blue)
description: A blue club made to look like Ogralus. Raises your spirit like Ogralus would.

name: Skull Hammer
description: Smashes any Yo-kai flat with a swing! An oversized hammer with a skull on it.

name: Peacock
description: As beautiful as a peacock feather, the blade can be seven different colors.

name: Sorcerer's Sword
description: A sword with a mysterious glow. So sharp, you can cleave things in two!

name: Starlight Blaster
description: A Usapyon only hopped-up beam gun made by analyzing the glitter of stars.

name: U. Oni Smasher (Bk)
description: Made from Orcanos, has a black sheen. Mighty, but costs a hefty price to use.

name: Master's Mallet
description: A fine mallet worthy of display. Wields the power to both repair and shatter.

skill: Strength up when you have no allies.
name: Sword of Solitude
description: It turns loneliness into power. Lone-wolf Yo-kai are fond of this.

name: U. Oni Smasher (R)
description: A club made out of select Gargaros. Its design emphasizes strength.

name: U. Oni Smasher (Bl)
description: A cool club made out of lots of Ogralus. It's perfect for dexterous Yo-kai.

name: Hell Hammer
description: It's sent many Yo-kai to the underworld. It can't be handled by normal people.

name: Captain Launcher
description: Captain Thunder's super high tech electromagnetic beam launcher.

name: Kingly Great Sword
description: A terrifying war sword that can slice 100 people in one swing in battle.

skill: Increases damage of Ice Element attacks by 25%.
name: Blizzard Blade
description: It has a beautifully clear, icy blade. So cold that it leaves a frozen scar.

skill: 20% more likely to cause criticals.
name: Divine Blade
description: It was tempered by the god of war. Just holding it fills you with power.

skill: ↑ damage of Lightning Element attacks by 25%.
name: Thunder Blade
description: A legendary sword said to cut thunder. It carries the power of lightning.

skill: Can no longer be revived by allies.
name: Doom Blade
description: A dubious sword that keeps fighting until it slices everything nearby.

skill: 10% less likely to cause criticals.
name: Rusted Blade
description: A legendary blade that lost its edge over time.

skill: Removes A Button cooldown entirely.
name: Psychic Blaster
description: Usapyon's secret weapon. Fires so fast it messes with opponents' minds.

skill: Increases damage of Fire Element attacks by 25%.
name: Oni Smasher (Fire)
description: The flames dance as this club is swung. Contains Gargaros' burning anger.

skill: Ignore the effects of foe’s guard.
name: Ogre Breaker
description: This club blows enemies away with brute force regardless of defense.

skill: Atk ↑ when attacked, 2% ↑ per hit, lasts till death.
name: Mighty Mallet
description: A great mallet with a strong presence. Trades back harsh blows with vigor.

skill: Temporarily go into Secrecy when in danger.
name: Phantom Mallet
description: Though seemingly for fierce warriors, this mallet cloaks the user in a pinch.

skill: All stats up when Soul Meter is full.
name: Samurai Mallet
description: A mallet forged from a samurai's armor. Rumors say his soul gives it strength.

skill: Increases damage of Water Element attacks by 25%.
name: Oni Smasher (Sea)
description: A bluish club with raging water's power. It contains Ogralus' silent fury.

skill: Adds 35% of your Strength stat to your Spirit stat.
name: Ogre Striker
description: A rare club made with lots of spikes. Sharp spikes assail nearby enemies.

skill: Increases damage of Wind Element attacks by 25%.
name: Horror Hammer
description: Hammer made only for destruction, it crushes and slashes at the same time.

skill: Attack up by 30% when below 25% HP.
name: Hammer of Despair
description: It ominously turns despair into power. See its true power in dire situations.

skill: Soul Meter charges 50% faster.
name: Hammer of Haunting
description: A hammer that contains Rubeus J's wrath, destroying again and again.

skill: Increases damage of Earth Element attacks by 25%.
name: Oni Smasher (Earth)
description: A heavyweight club that jars the earth. It contains Orcanos' unwavering wrath.

skill: Boosts damage to Oni-type foes by 15% for all allies.
name: Oni Smasher (Ult)
description: The true Oni Smasher made to defeat Oni. If Oni are nearby, it roars in delight.

skill: Criticals deal 75% more damage.
name: Oni Smasher (Sky)
description: It combines beauty and strength. Although powerful, it's very rare.

skill: Techniques take 30% less time to charge.
name: Grenade Thunder
description: A high-precision beam launcher, so prey never escapes when you aim.

skill: 50% more likely to crit at max dist, doesn't stack.
name: Ultimate Beam
description: Beam launcher with destructive power that can sink a warship in one shot.

skill: Increases the power of Soultimate Moves by 50%.
name: Water Dragonblade
description: A gift from the water dragon god. The sword gives power to its wielder.

skill: Perm. 5% Atk 35% Def 4% Spd ↑ when below 25% HP.
name: Oni Warlord Sword
description: It absorbs the power of raging Oni. It's insanely strong when in a bind.

skill: Allies' Soul Meter charges 15% faster.
name: Spooky Squasher
description: A wand that collects dead spirits. In a pinch, it'd make for a decent mace.

skill: MM Spd ↑ when attacking, 2% ↑ per hit, lasts 4 sec.
name: Cicada Sword
description: The sword of the cicada-style ninja. Only for cicada Yo-kai.

skill: Criticals deal 75% more damage.
name: Employee Blaster
description: The weapon of choice for employees. Fires beams backed by Hino's power.

skill: Drop foe's Defense by 0.8% every hit, lasts 5 sec.
name: Employee Sabers
description: Two sabers only for trusted personnel. Defends the company's heart and soul.

skill: Atk ↑ when attacking, 1% ↑ per hit, lasts 5 seconds.
name: B Rabbit Launcher
description: A beam launcher to protect the peace of the whole universe. B Yo-kai only.

skill: Absorbs 10% of the damage dealt.
name: Imperial Launcher
description: Emperor Usapyon's ultra high tech beam launcher.

skill: Drop foe's Defense by 0.8% every hit, lasts 5 sec.
name: Plasma Launcher
description: A launcher that uses plasma ammo. Can melt through any enemy vessel.

skill: Atk ↑ when attacking, 1% ↑ per hit, lasts 5 seconds.
name: Photon Beam
description: The pride of Captain Thunder. Lights up the path through any obstacle.

skill: Atk ↑ when attacking, 1% ↑ per hit, lasts 5 seconds.
name: Moonbeam
description: A supreme sword that cuts the enemy like the moon cuts through dark clouds.

skill: Drop foe's Defense by 0.8% every hit, lasts 5 sec.
name: Moon Shadow
description: A bewitched sword that sucks power. It looks like the moon's silhouette.

skill: Transforms Nekomata into Kaibyou Kamaitachi.
name: Kamaitachi Claw
description: A claw cloaked in a fierce storm. It awakens Nekomata's power.

name: Dirty Bracelet
description: A bracelet that's been stained. You can't really call it vintage either.

name: Cheap Bracelet
description: It's not the classiest accessory, but it does the job.

name: Worn Bangle
description: It's sort of cheap, but some Yo-kai say it's just right for them!

name: Colorful Bracelet
description: It values charm above all else. But its performance isn't bad either.

name: Spotty Bracelet
description: It looks nice against the summer sky. It's notably strong and easy to wear.

name: Striped Bracelet
description: A stylish bracelet with blue stripes. It's neither boring nor flashy.

skill: 20% more likely to cause criticals.
name: Killer Bracelet
description: Makes you perfectly clear-headed. You'll attack without delay wearing this.

name: Go-Go Bracelet
description: Feels stylish on the surface. It also has decent fighting power.

name: Kooky Bracelet
description: It has a unique toadstool design and is popular to show off.

name: Blue Bracelet
description: A cool, metallic blue bracelet. It's particularly popular among boys.

skill: 20% more likely to cause criticals.
name: Focus Bracelet
description: Useful, as it enhances concentration. Helps you find the enemy's weakness.

name: Turnabracelet
description: Greatly strengthens low-rank Yo-kai. Yo-kai up to Rank D can use it.

name: Steel Handcuff
description: Was attached to a fiendish prisoner. Its abilities have a high value.

name: Star Bracelet
description: A bracelet with a fancy star. It's for those who want to feel special.

name: Bracelet of Purity
description: A holy bracelet filled with pure prayers. Allows you to always stand calmly.

name: Phantom Bracelet
description: It's mysterious with a ghostly power. Its shape changes to fit your wrist.

name: Epic Turnabracelet
description: Vastly strengthens low-rank Yo-kai. Yo-kai up to Rank D can use it.

name: Whisped Wristband
description: Made from a part of Whisped Cream. It can absorb anything, even dreams.

skill: Str & Def temporarily up after defeating foes.
name: Peerless Bracelet
description: The more enemies defeated, the more its power raises. Terrifying to behold.

name: Engraved Handcuff
description: Handcuff engraved with odd patterns. Makes your power grow gradually.

name: Hi-Tech Wristband
description: The technological power that Robonyan 28 brought from the future.

name: Awoken Bracelet
description: Those chosen by Hinozall Awoken can wear this and receive its secret power.

name: Tattered Gauntlet
description: A beat-up gauntlet. It once housed the power of a dragon.

skill: Adds Ice Element to attacks.
name: Arctic Bracelet
description: It allows you to manipulate ice. Anything it touches freezes instantly.

skill: Increases the power of Soultimate Moves by 50%.
name: Legend Bracelet
description: A fabled fashion accessory that crackles with power.

skill: Adds Water Element to attacks.
name: Neptune Band
description: It's blessed by the god of the sea. You can manipulate water with it.

skill: Can no longer be revived by allies.
name: Fiend Band
description: A bracelet bearing a demon's crest. It houses a dark power.

skill: Adds Earth Element to attacks.
name: Terra Manacle
description: A bracelet with a mysterious power. It allows you to manipulate earth.

skill: 10% Atk 70% Def 8% Spd 20% MM ↑ when Inspirited ↓.
name: Malicious Manacle
description: Proof of a contract with a demon. It gives you devilish power.

skill: Strength & Defense up when in danger.
name: Mayhem Manacle
description: It gains value as it approaches havoc. It will run you down the path of ruin.

skill: Adds Wind Element to attacks.
name: Hurricane Bracer
description: Savage bracer that creates wind power from Whisped Cream's infinite energy.

skill: Criticals deal 75% more damage.
name: Demon Bracer
description: An evil bracer that creates dark power from Whisped Cream's infinite energy.

skill: ↑ damage to Negatively Inspirited foes by 25%.
name: Blizzard Bracer
description: Fluffy bracer perfectly reproduced from Whisped Cream's infinite energy.

skill: Adds Fire Element to attacks.
name: Incandescent Arm
description: It creates amazing thermal energy with Robonyan 28's futuristic strength.

skill: Adds Lightning Element to attacks.
name: Hypermagnetic Arm
description: It creates a surge of electricity with Robonyan 28's futuristic strength.

skill: 20% more likely to cause criticals.
name: Mighty Armband
description: It creates an explosive power with Robonyan 28's futuristic strength.

skill: Increases damage to all non-Big-Boss foes.
name: Eden Bracelet
description: If Hinozall Awoken approves of you, you'll get this and become a wizard.

skill: Increases the power of X button moves by 40%.
name: Sun God Bracelet
description: Surpass Hinozall Awoken to wear this. It awakens the power of the gods.

skill: Soul Meter charges 50% faster.
name: Venoct Gauntlet
description: A soul-powering gauntlet containing Venoct's strength.

skill: Increases the power of Soultimate Moves by 50%.
name: Extreme Shackle
description: A prison shackle for the Goku Yo-kai. Refashioned to give an extreme power.

skill: Def ↑ when attacking, 5% ↑ per hit, lasts 5 seconds.
name: Dynamo Armband
description: It draws metal in to act as a bulwark with Robonyan 28's futuristic strength.

skill: Upgrades Robonyan F to Robonyan 28.
name: Robonyan 28 Core
description: A heavily upgraded core meant to meet the lofty demands of a furious robot.

skill: 15% Atk 105% Def 12% Spd 30% MM ↑ when you're alone.
name: Moon God Bracelet
description: Best Hinozall Awoken to get this. Holds the lone power of the moon goddess.

skill: Bigger stat boost the more foes are targeting you.
name: Black Hole Bracelet
description: Hinozall's gift to handle intense gravity. Outputs productivity from pressure.

skill: Role changes to Tank.
name: Valiant Bracelet
description: Bracelet of the ruler who bravely faces his enemies. Lord Enma only.

skill: Role changes to Healer.
name: Gentle Bracelet
description: Bracelet of the ruler who is kind to his footmen. Lord Enma only.

skill: Role changes to Ranger.
name: Virtuous Bracelet
description: Bracelet of the ruler whose wisdom leads to victory. Lord Enma only.

skill: Changes Enma's fighting style.
name: Enma Blade
description: Burning with infernal intensity, this blade is an Enma exclusive!

name: Sinister Stick
description: It's better than no wand at all. Has a gloomy presence.

name: Simple Stick
description: A simple stick made only from wood. Used normally with no special powers.

name: Warped Wand
description: A stick with a distorted twist. It increases spirit power.

name: Skull on a Stick
description: It's a stick that makes you feel gloomy, but it raises your spirit power a bit.

name: Snazzy Stick
description: A stick that looks like glass jewelry. The gem has no power, but it's exciting.

name: Weird Wand
description: A twisted staff with a magic coating. It's easy-to-use and has a refined grip.

skill: Increases the power of Soultimate Moves by 50%.
name: Rad Rod
description: It seems like special attacks will be even more special with this rod.

skill: Higher chance to cause criticals to Hardy Hound.
name: White Dog Wand
description: A wand used to destroy Hardy Hound. Good against the white demon.

name: Three-Head Wand
description: A wand modeled after Slimamander. It's popular among some enthusiasts.

name: Pessimistick
description: The air runs cold around this wand. Other than that, it's quite easy to use.

name: Splendid Stick
description: Has a very expensive jewel on it. Makes you want to brag about it.

name: Wand of Chaos
description: Coated with too much magic, it has a wandering, chaotic aura.

skill: Increases the power of Soultimate Moves by 50%.
name: Super-Rad Rod
description: A wonderful rod to strengthen your Soultimate Moves with miracle power.

name: Koma's Pack
description: A heavy pack made for a trip. Koma brothers only.

skill: Higher chance to cause criticals to Hardy Hound.
name: White Dog Wand EX
description: Strongest wand against Hardy Hound. With this, he'll be crushed like an ant.

name: Wide-Eyed Wand
description: Curiously looking your way, its rolling eyes are grotesque.

name: Triptych Stick
description: Three evil eyes turned into a wand. A strained affair that creates energy.

name: Angelic Wand
description: A wand with angel's wings. Its cute appearance is popular with women.

name: Wicked Wand
description: Wand with massive amounts of energy that finally gained a will of its own.

name: Swirly Pack
description: A pack filled with swirly treasures. Koma brothers only.

name: Dame Staff
description: A staff with tons of hidden magic that can manipulate time.

name: Triple Dragon Wand
description: With all three eyes open, the wand shows heinous magical power.

name: Hell's Eye Wand
description: It has strong magic, but its eyes always feel like they're staring at you.

name: Staff of Judgment
description: A staff that contains Hinozall's power. Based on his own designs.

skill: Increases damage of Ice Element attacks by 25%.
name: Crystal Wand
description: A wand as beautiful as a snowflake. Draws out your maximum ice power.

skill: Attack up by 30% when below 25% HP.
name: Wand of Fortune
description: When in a pinch, it drastically changes the fate of its holder.

skill: Increases damage of Water Element attacks by 25%.
name: Sea-Splitter Staff
description: It can split the ocean with just shake. A staff with great water magic.

skill: Can no longer be revived by allies.
name: Staff of Ultimate Evil
description: Although it has tremendous power, its owner will be cursed by evil.

skill: Attack up by 30% when below 25% HP.
name: Soul Sack
description: A pack stuffed with hope to succeed in the city, in one way or another.

skill: Defense up by 210% when below 25% HP.
name: Specter Sack
description: A pack stuffed with hope to beat the odds in the city, in one way or another.

skill: Techniques take 30% less time to charge.
name: Tengu Fan
description: Tengu draw power from fans like these. For Tengu Yo-kai only.

skill: Increases damage of Fire Element attacks by 25%.
name: Triple Fever Wand
description: Three eyeballs mean triple firepower! Fire Yo-kai long for this wand.

skill: Adds 35% of your Spirit stat to your Strength stat.
name: Triple Trouble Wand
description: Turns negative energy into power. Hold a grudge and it doubles its output!

skill: Increases damage of Earth Element attacks by 25%.
name: Eye of the Earth
description: It gives grace or judgment. A wand with power over land.

skill: Criticals deal 75% more damage.
name: Eye of Death
description: A staff with a huge, murderous eyeball. Once you're seen, you can't escape.

skill: Increases damage of Wind Element attacks by 25%.
name: Holy Wind Wand
description: Symbolizes Dame Dedtime's forgotten heart. Surrounded by sacred wind.

skill: Increases damage of Drain techniques by 25%.
name: Staff of Avarice
description: A staff symbolizing Dame Dedtime's spiteful heart. It spews darkness.

skill: ↑ damage of Lightning Element attacks by 25%.
name: Thunder God Wand
description: Changes Hinozall's power into lightning. Imagination amplifies it.

skill: Increases effect of healing techniques by 30%.
name: Staff of Heaven
description: Changes Hinozall's power into healing. Imagination amplifies regeneration.

skill: Attack up by 20% when HP is full.
name: Creator's Wand
description: Draws out Hinozall's maximum power. All bow before the god's majesty.

skill: Increases revival speed by 100%.
name: Lunar Wand
description: Its light is gentle like moonlight. It's said that it repels pain.

skill: All allies' Spirit up by 5%.
name: Moon God Wand
description: None can oppose the power that the moon goddess granted this wand.

name: Ugly Ring
description: It's not pretty, but it's pretty effective.

name: Rusty Ring
description: A ring that's gotten old and rusty. It still has power.

name: Bone Ring
description: Ring made of Gutsy Bones's cartilage. It's actually soft and fits the finger well.

name: Rainbow Ring
description: A beautiful ring that sparkles with all the colors of the rainbow.

name: Dawn Ring
description: A pleasant ring made in the image of a refreshing morning.

skill: Causes damage regardless of foes favorable elements.
name: Ring of Insight
description: It grants a little of Espy's power and leaves opponent's minds defenseless.

name: Backbone Ring
description: A wild item with a ring-like shape made from Gutsy's twisted bones.

name: Gilded Ring
description: A glittering golden ring made simply of Goldy's bones.

name: Ring of Knowledge
description: A ring that will improve your mind. The wisdom of Yo-kai is engraved on it.

name: Promise Ring
description: This ring is the symbol of a promise. It's gained great power over time.

name: Slumber Ring
description: A ring boiled in magic with two colors that waver and shift.

skill: Causes damage regardless of foes favorable elements.
name: All-Seeing Ring
description: An improved Ring of Enlightenment. It lays the hearts of enemies bare.

name: Turnaring
description: Helps low-rank Yo-kai win with a smile. Yo-kai up to Rank D can use it.

name: Gleaming Ring
description: A luxury item made to resemble Glitzy Bones's eternal brilliance.

name: Jawbone Ring
description: A solid-to-the-core, fat bone ring. It raises both magic power and defense.

name: Metallic Ring
description: A stylish ring made from Goldy's bones that has a special purple color.

name: Mystery Ring
description: A mysteriously crafted ring. It was made by a steady-handed artisan.

name: Wave Ring
description: A ring that continuously emits special waves and amplifies magic power.

name: Lunar Ring
description: A softly glowing ring said to contain the power of the moon.

name: Epic Turnaring
description: Supports low-rank Yo-kai with all its power. Yo-kai up to Rank D can use it.

skill: Spirit & Defense temporarily up after defeating foes.
name: Peerless Ring
description: A ring feared by Yo-kai that gets stronger the more it defeats enemies.

name: Skull Ring
description: A ring made from Gutsy's bones. Looks bad but has lots of secret fans.

name: Goldy Ring
description: A ring made from Goldy's bones. Why the ribs, nobody knows.

name: Glitzy Ring
description: Lowers power and increases magic. Glitzy Bones's curse and blessing.

name: Zazel's Ruby Ring
description: Zazel's burning crimson ring. It's filled with his fierce power.

skill: Increases damage of Ice Element attacks by 25%.
name: Permafrost Ring
description: A chilly, azure ring that is decorated with unmelting ice.

description: A fabled fashion accessory that crackles with power.

skill: Increases damage of Wind Element attacks by 25%.

description: A ring that magnifies wind power with the strength of the wind god.

name: Fiend Ring
description: A ring bearing a demon's crest. It houses a dark power.

skill: Increases damage of Fire Element attacks by 25%.
name: Incineration Ring
description: A wand that manipulates fire and can burn enemies to bones in hellfire.

skill: Increases damage of Earth Element attacks by 25%.
name: Ring of Erosion
description: Ashes to ashes and dust to dust... It represents the nature of life.

skill: Increases effect of healing techniques by 30%.
name: Saint's Ring
description: Healed sufferers long ago. It's modeled after a saint.

skill: ↑ damage of Lightning Element attacks by 25%.
name: Thunderheart
description: A stylish ring with lightning inside. Put it on and your finger tingles.

skill: Increases damage of Drain techniques by 25%.
name: Pinkheart
description: A pretty ring with a heart-shaped jewel, but the rumor says it sucks life away.

skill: Spirit & Defense up when in danger.
name: Goldenheart
description: You can sense Goldy Bones's love as the ring firmly protects its owner.

skill: Increases damage of Water Element attacks by 25%.
name: Blue-Blood Ring
description: A beautiful glass skull ring dyed blue with water magic.

skill: 20% more likely to cause criticals.
name: Blood-Red Ring
description: A red skull ring with a shady history. Put it on and you'll be bloodthirsty.

skill: Causes damage regardless of foes favorable elements.
name: Diamond Ring
description: A supreme ring with a dazzling shine. Its rich glitter will turn heads.

skill: Soul Meter charges 50% faster.
name: Zazel's Agate Ring
description: Zazel's ring with its icy blue jewel, filled with the gruesome spirit of cold.

skill: Start mission with a 100% Soul Meter charge.
name: Zazelmare's Ring
description: A gem from the underworld sits on the immensely powerful, ultimate ring.

name: Wooden Shield
description: A light, easy-to-use wooden shield. It has the healing warmth of a tree.

name: Round Shield
description: A shield that is made of a light metal. Easy to handle, but not very reliable.

name: Bathhouse Bucket
description: Simple wooden bucket for bathhouses. It is unexpectedly suited for defense.

name: Trash Can Lid
description: Looks like an ordinary trash can lid. But don't underestimate its defense.

name: Iron Shield
description: A strong shield reinforced with iron. It's a little heavy, but easy to handle.

name: Sturdy Shield
description: A shield made of bulky metal. It's quite hard, but very heavy.

skill: Attracts more attention from foes.
name: Elegant Shield
description: A lavish shield emphasizing luxury. Poor for defense, but it draws the eye.

name: Pigbucket
description: Based on Sproink's bucket. You can tell he knows his buckets.

name: Silver Shield
description: By giving the shield a silver plating, the shield is both sturdy and encouraging.

name: Alloy Shield
description: Aiming for maximum hardness, it was made from combining various metals.

skill: Attracts more attention from foes.
name: Glitzy Shield
description: A shield with jewels. It draws the eyes of friends and enemies alike.

name: Force Shield
description: Converts electric energy into a beam shield. Robot Yo-kai only.

name: Hogbucket
description: Though it's black and looks dirty, it's surprisingly sturdy.

name: Fine Pigbucket
description: A bath tub with a cypress fragrance. Sproink looks proud on the stamp.

name: Giant Cauldron Lid
description: The lid matches the pot. The seal is decorative, but it has high defense.

name: Paladin's Shield
description: Made by those longing for a Holy Knight. Just like a Holy Knight's shield.

name: Tactician's Shield
description: Designed by a famous tactician. It can take attacks from any direction.

name: Force Shield EX
description: Improved with futuristic technology. Twice as efficient! Robot Yo-kai only.

skill: Immune to Negative Inspirit effects when guarding.
name: Innocent Shield
description: Has a bored, innocent expression. Innocence can withstand anything.

name: Gold Pigbucket
description: A luxury bath bucket made of pure gold. Sproink looks proud on the seal.

name: Wobblewok Lid
description: This lid can contain any disaster. Even as a shield, it's amazing!

name: Twirly Swirler
description: An umbrella used by Kabuking that was developed into an elegant shield.

name: Evil Hogbucket
description: A bucket with an unbelievable stench. Hoggles' evil sneer brings anxiety.

name: Dark Matter Shield
description: A shield made of steel from the future. It's just as strong as Robonyan 3000.

skill: Reduces Ice Element damage by 50%.
name: Frost Shield
description: Has a royal, medieval feeling, but it's actually a tech shield good against ice.

skill: Can no longer be stunned by foes' attacks.
name: Legend Shield
description: A shield designed for the legendary. Suits the heroic and will never falter.

skill: Reduces Water Element damage by 50%.
name: Whirlpool Shield
description: Houses the soul of a whirlpool. It can swallow up any water attack.

skill: Can no longer be revived by allies.
name: Shield of Resolve
description: Only those who do not fear death are allowed to possess this shield.

skill: Reduces Fire Element damage by 50.
name: Blazing Pigbucket
description: A strange bucket that can scoop up fire. The bucket itself is hot like a flame.

skill: Defense up by 210% when below 25% HP.
name: Alluring Pigbucket
description: Dancing with this bucket will charm anyone who happens to be watching.

skill: Reduces Earth Element damage by 50%.
name: Stone Hogbucket
description: A bucket cut from an ancient stratum. It's as hard as a diamond.

skill: Partially reflects damage from foes' attacks.
name: Lava Hogbucket
description: Water added to it immediately boils and stays as hot as lava.

skill: Reduces Lightning Element damage by 50%.
name: Lid of Isolation
description: A wonderful lid that can stop trouble. It's an insulator against electricity.

skill: Attracts more attention from foes.
name: Lid of Darkness
description: Uses the dark to seal the dark. Cursed and likely to be targeted.

skill: Reduces Wind Element damage by 50%.
name: Windbreaker
description: Eludes all types of black magic like a willow bending in the wind.

skill: Reduces the damage taken from drain techniques.
name: Drain Dampener
description: A stylish umbrella that gets rid of evil hearts with a wicked crushing seal.

skill: Enhances the effects of guarding by 10%.
name: Blossombrella
description: Depicts a flurry of cherry blossoms. Some hesitate to attack its beauty.

skill: All allies' Speed up by 8%.
name: Antigravity Shield
description: Shield invented by future Yo-kai that removes gravity from touched objects.

skill: Drops incoming damage by 20% and gives super armor.
name: Quantum Shield
description: It's made with rare metals from the future and can repel even meteors.

skill: Will hold HP at 1 twice, even if HP falls to 0.
name: White Lunar Shield
description: Silvery white like the midday moon. Guards against adversity.

skill: All allies' Defense up by 35%.
name: Gold Lunar Shield
description: All-purpose and blocks any attack with the gravity power of a full moon.

name: Patched-Up Charm
description: It was made with patches. Though full of heart, it's misshapen.

name: Aged Charm
description: An old charm whose power has atrophied over the years.

name: Plain Pendant
description: A pendant made with a plain stone. It's a substitute charm.

name: Fragrant Charm
description: Has a slightly fragrant smell. It allows you to relax while you fight.

name: Warm Charm
description: Warm to the touch, the charm feels comfortable and gentle.

skill: Enhances the effects of guarding by 10%.
name: Spirit Charm
description: Overflowing with wonder and motivation. Perfect for hard workers.

name: One-Eyed Pouch
description: Even Tattleterror's ridiculous strength can't tear this robust fabric.

name: Sturdy Bag
description: A small, powerful bag made of cloth that Hardy Hound carries.

name: Courage Pendant
description: It gives courage to whoever sees it. A pendant with a blue stone tied to it.

name: Lucky Charm
description: Brings good fortune and offers powerful protection.

name: Happy Charm
description: Just having it is enough to be loaded with happy thoughts.

skill: Enhances the effects of guarding by 10%.
name: Charge-Up Charm
description: Willpower for when the going gets tough. If you have this, you'll be OK.

name: Turnacharm
description: A charm made for the weak. Yo-kai up to Rank D can use it.

name: Pink Pouch
description: Packed with Tattleterror's pure heart. It's a cute but tough pouch.

name: Pink Bag
description: A cute pink bag. Nobody knows why it's pink.

name: Passion Pendant
description: Hearts grow passionate when it's worn. A pendant with a strange stone in it.

name: Noble Charm
description: Made with only select materials. The charm has a classy aura.

name: Pulsating Charm
description: A mysterious charm that makes a pulsating sound when held in the palm.

name: Epic Turnacharm
description: A powerful charm for the weak. Yo-kai up to Rank D can use it.

skill: Avoids enemy attacks every now and then.
name: Clover Charm
description: A charm with a four-leaf clover. Maybe something good will happen.

name: One-Eye Pouch XL
description: In Tattleterror's youth, she traveled around, training in martial arts with it.

name: Hardy Bag
description: Gives you power like Hardy Hound's.

name: Goddess Charm
description: Mysterious charm made from Kat Kraydel's yarn in the Divine Paradise.

name: Golden Swirl Charm
description: They who possess this can live among the flames of hell clad in golden power.

skill: Reduces Lightning Element damage by 50%.
name: Thunder Charm
description: A thunder stone charm. It absorbs lightning for its owner.

skill: Can no longer be stunned by foes' attacks.
name: Legend Charm
description: A famed charm that offers the wearer unmatched protection.

skill: Reduces Fire Element damage by 50.
name: Volcano Charm
description: A charm that conceals hot lava within. It makes you strong against fire.

skill: Can no longer be revived by allies.
name: Fiend Charm
description: A charm bearing a demon's crest. It houses a dark power.

skill: Increases area of effect for moves by 35%.
name: Make-Up Bag
description: Tattleterror's favorite make-up bag. It has a nice smell to it.

skill: Reduces Water Element damage by 50%.
name: Swimming Bag
description: A waterproof bag that replicates the one Tattleterror usually uses.

skill: Enhances the effects of guarding by 10%.
name: Endurance Bag
description: Given to young Tattleterror by her mom. Everything started from this bag.

skill: Reduces Ice Element damage by 50%.
name: Blizzard Bag
description: A bag as white as snow. You'll be OK no matter how cold it is.

skill: Reduces the damage taken from drain techniques.
name: Righteous Bag
description: A pure bag from a high priest. Has writings in it to shatter evil.

skill: Immune to Negative Inspirit effects.
name: Exorcist Bag
description: Just holding it is purifying. This sacred bag frightens demons.

skill: Reduces Wind Element damage by 50%.
name: Fair Wind Charm
description: The wind will always be at your back with this powerful wind charm.

skill: Attracts more attention from foes.
name: Bright Charm
description: Continuously emits a dazzling light that charms evildoers.

skill: Immune to criticals.
name: Guiding Charm
description: Naturally leads its owner to avoid unfortunate accidents and disasters.

skill: Defense up by 140% when HP is full.
name: Tranquil Charm
description: Possess this to unify the universe and bring world peace for centuries.

skill: Strength up by 5% for 15 seconds for healed allies, at (Lv10).
name: Royal Swirl Charm
description: A national treasure in the Yo-kai world. It can see far into the distant future.

name: Grubby Belt
description: A belt that's been dirty from the start. The broken buckle makes it loose.

name: Plain Sash
description: Tighten it firmly for more strength. A plain sash for physical power.

name: Basic Belt
description: A belt that matches any outfit. It's better than nothing.

name: Designer Belt
description: A belt with a shapely design. It makes your waist look thin.

name: Flashy Sash
description: Made from a fine fabric. Its smooth texture is comfortable.

name: Round-Buckle Belt
description: A belt with a massive buckle. It feels firm and resilient.

skill: Own HP restore steadily when Negatively Inspirited.
name: Spiteful Sash
description: Sash filled with someone's bitterness. Wearing it takes a lot of courage.

name: Sturdy Sash
description: It's really tight, but slightly flexible. It's made to order for Demuncher.

name: Bold Belt
description: A purple belt that has a wild feeling. Everyone will notice its shiny buckle!

name: Shinobi Sash
description: Invented by a family of Shinobi, it won't come loose, no matter how you move.

name: Chic Belt
description: Adults can tell the difference. A real leather belt with a gold buckle.

skill: Own HP restore steadily when Negatively Inspirited.
name: Grudge Sash
description: A hair-raisingly eerie sash. It turns ill intentions into power.

name: Ancestral Sash
description: It was woven using ancient, traditional techniques. Classic Yo-kai only.

name: Ceremonial Sash
description: A black sash used for ceremonies. Wear it and you'll feel tense.

name: Glutton's Sash
description: Never too tight no matter what you eat thanks to the Demuncher beads.

name: Fancy Belt
description: This belt makes both viewers and its wearer feel happy.

name: Master Sash
description: It was designed for sword fighting. The samurai of old favored this sash.

name: Victory Belt
description: Has a shiny V-shaped buckle. It's noticeable and functional.

name: Sacred Sash
description: A dignified treasure that feels lovely when worn. Classic Yo-kai only.

name: Senator Sash
description: Made from McKraken's tentacles. It's stretchable and comfortable.

skill: Absorbs 10% of the damage dealt.
name: Cutie Belt
description: Comforts you while you wear it. It's super cute.

name: Greedyguts Sash
description: It's full of Demuncher's power. It's strong and gives a hearty appetite.

name: Sentient Sash
description: Woven carefully for the wearer's safety. It dramatically improves strength.

name: Golden Claws Cloth
description: A loincloth clad in golden power. Worth 100 times more than any treasure.

skill: Reduces Ice Element damage by 50%.
name: Alpine Sash
description: A barrier against ice is in each thread. Even in blizzards, you won't feel cold.

skill: Recovers 50% of own HP when an ally is defeated.
name: Legend Sash
description: Valuable when you have lots of friends. It turns your friends' trust into power.

skill: Reduces Water Element damage by 50%.
name: Splash Belt
description: Its buckle has the power of the sea. Everyone envies this super belt.

skill: Can no longer be revived by allies.
name: Ultimate Belt
description: Depletes life spans to give strength. The name Ultimate suits it well.

skill: Absorbs fire damage and recovers 30% of it as HP.
name: Blazing Sash
description: It laps up and consumes winding flames. It's a glutton for fire.

skill: Reduces Lightning Element damage by 50%.
name: Thunder Sash
description: It laps up and consumes rolling thunder. It's a glutton for lightning.

skill: Own HP restore steadily when Negatively Inspirited.
name: Succor Sash
description: It laps up and consumes battling Yo-kai. It's a glutton for their cries.

skill: 3% Atk, 21% Def, 2.4% Spd and 6% MM boost for allies.
name: Seismic Sash
description: It turns the enormous power that flows from the earth into your own.

skill: Ascension rate ↓ 40%, max 90%.
name: Salvation Sash
description: Sash that keeps wandering souls away. Wards off the dead with its pure aura.

skill: Heals 50% more of own HP.
name: Serenity Sash
description: Can't be used without a virtuous heart. It's good for honorable individuals.

skill: Reduces Wind Element damage by 50%.
name: Squall Sash
description: The wind blows when danger is near. This sash protects its wearer.

skill: Picking up items or Oni Orbs recovers own HP.
name: Midnight Sun Sash
description: Woven from the glow of an arctic night. It gives vitality to those who wear it.

skill: Own HP restores steadily.
name: Sovereign Sash
description: With this, you can rule the world. It's a majestic sash of legend.

skill: All allies' Spirit up by 5%.
name: Living World Cloth
description: A loincloth for psychic sages. Can manipulate anything in the world.

skill: Spirit up by 10% for 15 seconds for healed allies.
name: Royal Claws Cloth
description: A national treasure in the Yo-kai world. Can change ancient history.

name: Black Charm
description: An accessory featuring black flowers. It's plain but some Yo-kai like it.

name: Rustic Amulet
description: It was made by kneading thick soil. A simple amulet against evil spirits.

name: Broken Bell
description: Brand new, but it's already worn. Makes a cute sound. Cat Yo-kai only.

name: Catfish Bauble
description: A keyring modeled after a catfish, a guardian deity since olden times.

name: Flower Charm
description: Looks nice and is slightly fragrant. It's popular and smells like spring.

name: Elegant Amulet
description: A shiny amulet against evil. Has a soft energy when touched.

name: Cat Bell
description: A popular ringing sound for cats. Cat Yo-kai only.

skill: Attracts less attention from foes.
name: Dimmy Amulet
description: Protection amulet shaped like Dimmy. Perfect for Yo-kai who like it quiet.

name: Wht. Catfish Bauble
description: A keyring with a white catfish, a good omen even among catfish.

name: Aurora Charm
description: A beautiful item that changes color like an aurora depending on its angle.

name: Intriguing Amulet
description: Various guesses have been made about the story behind this amulet.

skill: Attracts less attention from foes.
name: Blandon Amulet
description: Protection amulet shaped like Blandon. For Yo-kai who don't feel like talking.

name: Turnabeads
description: Strengthens low-rank Yo-kai. Yo-kai up to Rank D can use these.

name: Gold Catfish Bauble
description: Looks like it would improve your luck. However, it doesn't have that effect.

name: Big Catfish Bauble
description: A keyring shaped like a big catfish. Both size and effects are huge.

name: Cat's Paw Bell
description: This paw print bell feels like a paw. Cat Yo-kai only.

name: Violet Charm
description: Emits an enveloping, gentle energy. It's a violet-colored charm.

name: Midnight Amulet
description: It looks like a cloudless, starry sky. A beautiful charm against evil spirits.

name: Epic Turnabeads
description: Strengthens low-rank Yo-kai immensely. For Yo-kai up to Rank D.

skill: Absorbs 10% of the damage dealt.
name: Vampbloom Bauble
description: It sucks the life from those close by. A beautiful, yet fearful flower amulet.

skill: Feline Yo-kai are more likely to become friends.
name: Nyanbelievabell
description: Makes cats come running as if it were rubbed in catnip. Cat Yo-kai only.

name: Pond Guard Bauble
description: It looks like the lord of a pond. Steadily improves your abilities.

name: Marsh Lord Bauble
description: A keyring with an air of dignity. Causes earthquakes when angry.

name: Swirlious Amulet
description: A golden ball with a strong power. There's a secret story behind it...

name: Red Paws Amulet
description: A golden coin with a strong power. There's a secret story behind it...

skill: Reduces Lightning Element damage by 50%.
name: Plasma Charm
description: An accessory that catches all electric shocks with its plasma power.

skill: Ascension rate ↓ 40%, max 90%.
name: Hero's Charm
description: Equipped with kindness and strength, it'll give anyone a chance.

skill: Reduces Earth Element damage by 50%.
name: Mountain God Boon
description: An amulet that looks like a huge dragon lying at the bottom of the mountains.

skill: Can no longer be revived by allies.
name: Annihilation Boon
description: Every ability improves when you wear it, but you can't revive in dire situations.

skill: Soul Meter charges 50% faster.
name: Spirit Bell
description: A bell with a special chime. Trapped spirits feel more at home with it.

skill: Absorbs 10% of the damage dealt.
name: Vampiric Fangs
description: Dentures usually aren't scary, but these let you suck blood!

skill: Spd ↑ when attacking, 0.8% ↑ per hit, lasts 5 seconds.
name: Cicada Charm
description: A charm made from a cicada's shell. If you hold it close, you can hear it sing.

skill: Absorbs water damage and recovers 30% of it as HP.
name: Fisherman Bauble
description: Flooded with prayers for big catches, it protects you from all water damage.

skill: Increases amount of HP absorbed by 100%.
name: Boatman Bauble
description: Made in the River Styx, it completely sucks the life from hostile beings.

skill: Negative Inspirits last 20% longer on everyone.
name: Invocation Bauble
description: It summons evil and never-ending misfortune upon your enemies.

skill: Reduces Ice Element damage by 50%.
name: Glacier Bauble
description: Lies at the bottom of a frozen river. Has the power of a giant catfish.

skill: Recovers own HP after defeating foes.
name: Underworld Bauble
description: A greedy catfish from a dark realm. It eats the souls of living Yo-kai.

skill: Attracts less attention from foes.
name: Evil Bauble
description: Lives quietly in a dark realm. Holds the power of the catfish.

skill: Reduces Fire Element damage by 50.
name: Swirlious Bauble
description: It's overflowing with ancient magic. Extinguishes all flames.

skill: Temporarily go into Secrecy when in danger.
name: S. Swirlious Bauble
description: It's overflowing with ancient magic. Erases its owner's presence.

skill: HP restores steadily while charging a move.
name: Hellhound Bauble
description: It's overflowing with ancient magic. Erases its owner's injuries.

skill: Reduces Wind Element damage by 50%.
name: Red Paws Bauble
description: It's overflowing with red-tinted magic. Protects its owner from all winds.

skill: All allies' Strength up by 5%.
name: S. Red Paws Bauble
description: It's overflowing with red-tinted magic. Fiercely improves physical abilities.

skill: HP restores steadily while guarding.
name: Yo-kai Cat Bauble
description: It's overflowing with red-tinted magic. Gently heals its wearer's wounds.

skill: Increases damage to foes in danger.
name: Moonlit Dog Bauble
description: The black carving exudes power in the moonlight to give its owner courage.

skill: Increases damage to foes in danger.
name: Moonlit Cat Bauble
description: The red carving exudes power in the moonlight to save its owner from peril.

skill: Remains in Invader Mode for the entire mission.
name: Invader Chip
description: You'll be dominated by anger just by holding this wild chip. Usapyon only.
